thread.title: Florida Republican has 'change of heart' on assault weapons

title: Florida Republican has 'change of heart' on assault weapons
text:
Florida Republican has 'change of heart' on assault weapons 3:28pm EST - 01:18 
Veteran and Republican congressman Brian Mast discusses his 'change of heart' and urges action for banning assault weapons in the aftermath of the Parkland, Florida massacre. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Veteran and Republican congressman Brian Mast discusses his 'change of heart' and urges action for banning assault weapons in the aftermath of the Parkland, Florida massacre.
